author: Mike Veldsink <mikev@uber.com>
name: payments-reference-app
description: Reference app to introduce you to the uber deposit API

scripts.start: parcel build src/shared/resources/**/** --public-url ./ --global root -t node -d src/shared/public && concurrently --kill-others "node src/merchant/index" "node src/app/index"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "parcel watch src/shared/resources/**/** -d src/shared/public --global root --target node --public-url ./" "nodemon src/app/index" "nodemon src/merchant/index"
